name: Pac-Man (itch) (ICleanPools)
description: This is a recreation of Pac-Man (1980) in Unity, completed as a personal learning project. I created all assets for the game other than the font myself, in an effort to become familiar with as many facets of game development in Unity as possible. The game operates nearly identically to the original, as laid out in the Pac-Man Dossier (here). Minimal changes were made where I deemed appropriate.
